definitions.definition: The quality or degree of being strong.
definitions.example: It requires great strength to lift heavy objects.

definitions.definition: The intensity of a force or power; potency.
definitions.example: He had the strength of ten men.

definitions.definition: The strongest part of something; that on which confidence or reliance is based.

definitions.example: We all have our own strengths and weaknesses.

definitions.definition: An armed force, a body of troops.
To give strength to; to strengthen.
